Text:
Mothra67, hope you got the hawk & dove volume 3 post i compiled.

hey do you have the first (silver age) series, the hawk and the dove"? it was ditko, i think. i can probably grab it from the mtcdc torrent if you don't.
My Share ratio on this already hit 17 and it's not even been 2 days yet!  Gotta make room for more uploads that are much bigger, so it's up to the rest of you to keep it going for all to enjoy!
STF, no I do not, I would love it if you could grab it!  :)  I did get V2 and V3 from you though!
oh ok. i will get them. i am pretty sure they were in mtcdc. thanks for all these golden age rarities my friend.
